data.name: Battlegrounds : First Blast
data.detailed_description:
WISHLIST THE FULL GAME

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1703640/BattleGrounds__War_Tanks_And_Nukes/?beta=0


About the Game

Battlegrounds takes the best part of roguelites, tower-defense, strategy and action genres and fuses them to create an enticing gameplay experience with easy to understand mechanics.
The player must defend his home base from enemy tanks by quickly brainstorming good strategies, unlocking and upgrading machines and making the best use of every new environment present.



  • Highly Replayable
  • Awesome soundtracks
  • Unlock and upgrade special vehicles
  • Explore various strategies and playstyles
  • Unlock achievements

data.short_description: A military styled action tower-defense game filled with nukes, missiles and tanks. Improve your building, canons and tanks. Purchase stronger ammunition and survive the next wave. Highly replayable, tough and addictive. The fun never ends
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
